* **Manuscript** <a href="../extras/manuscript.pdf" target="_blank">(manuscript.pdf)</a>: A draft scientific manuscript describing the methods and findings
* **Supplement A** <a href="../extras/supplementA.html" target="_blank">(supplementA.html)</a>: Methodological details and additional analyses
* **Supplement B** <a href="../extras/supplementB.html" target="_blank">(supplementB.html)</a>: Data inclusion criteria, coding details, and breakdown of participant information/demographics

The Rmarkdown (`.Rmd`) source of these documents may be found in the [`inst/manuscript/`](https://github.com/richarddmorey/Morey_Hoekstra_StatCognition/tree/master/inst/manuscript) subfolder of the project.

* **ReprohackNL feedback letter ** <a href="../extras/reprohack2019_feedback_letter.pdf" target="_blank">(reprohack2019_feedback_letter.pdf)</a>: Feedback from participants in [ReprohackNL (2019)](https://reprohacknl.github.io/ReproHack/) who attempted to reproduce the results in the manuscript from the data (including tables and figures). All results were successfully reproduced.
